verses.name: Ezekiel 1:1
verses.text: Now it came to pass in the thirtieth year, in the fourth month, in the fifth day of the month, as I was among the captives by the river of Chebar, that the heavens were opened, and I saw visions of God.

verses.name: Ezekiel 1:2
verses.text: In the fifth day of the month, which was the fifth year of king Jehoiachin’s captivity,

verses.name: Ezekiel 1:3
verses.text: The word of the Lord came expressly unto Ezekiel the priest, the son of Buzi, in the land of the Chaldeans by the river Chebar; and the hand of the Lord was there upon him.
